<h3 id="X31789">X(31789) = CENTER OF THE ORTHOPOLAR CIRCLE OF THESE TRIANGLES: HEXYL AND MANDART-INCIRCLE</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 2*a^7-2*(b+c)*a^6-3*(b^2+c^2)*a^5+(b+c)*(3*b^2-4*b*c+3*c^2)*a^4+2*(b+c)^2*b*c*a^3+2*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*b*c*a^2+(b^2-c^2)^2*(b-c)^2*a-(b^2-c^2)^3*(b-c)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(31789) = 3*X(165)-X(11826) = 3*X(3058)-X(7982) = 3*X(3576)-X(7354) = 3*X(5587)-X(6253) = 5*X(7987)-X(10483) = 3*X(10202)-2*X(24470) = 3*X(11246)-5*X(15016) = 3*X(15170)-2*X(24680)</b>
<p>
As a point on the Euler line, X(31789) has Shinagawa coefficients (2*R+r, -2*R-3*r)</p>
<p>X(31789) lies on these lines:
{1,5812}, {2,3}, {9,355}, {10,5842}, {11,11012}, {12,10902}, {36,30264}, {40,1728}, {72,952}, {165,5445}, {214,2829}, {226,1385}, {329,944}, {389,517}, {495,10267}, {496,11249}, {497,22770}, {515,960}, {516,3754}, {528,11362}, {529,5882}, {572,1901}, {580,1834}, {938,2095}, {954,16202}, {956,12116}, {1001,26332}, {1329,6796}, {1479,3428}, {1482,3488}, {1484,13279}, {1490,18481}, {1617,10629}, {1713,5755}, {1724,5721}, {1750,4679}, {1753,15941}, {1852,1882}, {1864,10572}, {2077,10958}, {2949,6598}, {3058,7982}, {3419,5690}, {3487,4308}, {3564,10477}, {3576,7354}, {3579,5840}, {3583,15908}, {3585,15931}, {3655,28609}, {3820,11499}, {3885,5844}, {4292,9940}, {4294,10306}, {4302,10310}, {4324,24466}, {4330,5537}, {4640,12616}, {5175,5657}, {5248,7680}, {5436,5715}, {5441,5538}, {5444,7987}, {5535,16113}, {5584,12953}, {5587,6253}, {5709,5722}, {5719,24299}, {5728,5762}, {5729,5759}, {5771,6734}, {5780,18228}, {5787,7330}, {5884,17768}, {5887,12664}, {5924,7971}, {5927,28186}, {6261,24703}, {6748,18591}, {8070,14794}, {8273,12943}, {8544,31657}, {8726,9579}, {9580,12700}, {9803,11684}, {9841,15239}, {10198,10894}, {10202,24470}, {10386,10679}, {10592,26487}, {10827,16208}, {10950,18397}, {11246,15016}, {11491,17757}, {12575,13600}, {12680,12757}, {15170,24680}, {15254,31673}, {15325,26286}, {15911,22793}, {25413,28212}, {28146,31787}</p>
<p>
X(31789) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {1, 11827}, {3, 7491}, {40, 6284}, {10572, 14110}, {15171, 31799}<br>
X(31789) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (1482, 15172), (4292, 9940), (5777, 12572), (13600, 12575), (18990, 1385), (20420, 5), (24474, 12433), (31775, 3), (31777, 3579)<br>
X(31789) = anticomplement of X(37281)<br>
X(31789) = {X(i), X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (3, 382, 6850), (6834, 17556, 5), (6942, 6963, 13747)<br>
</p>
